ground_truth.thought: 分析过去一年内澳元兑日元汇率的波动情况
ground_truth.name: HistoricalData.get_rate_history

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'CurrencyExchange.get_current_rate', 'description': 'Get the current exchange rate of a currency pair.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'currency_pair', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the currency pair in the format of CUR1/CUR2'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'rate', 'description': 'the current exchange rate of the currency pair.'}]}, {'name': 'HistoricalData.get_rate_history', 'description': 'Get the historical exchange rates of a currency pair over a specified period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'currency_pair', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the currency pair in the format of CUR1/CUR2'}, {'name': 'period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the period for which to get the historical data, e.g., 1Y for one year'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'history', 'description': 'the historical exchange rates of the currency pair.'}]}, {'name': 'FinancialInstruments.get_swap_info', 'description': 'Get information about foreign exchange swaps and currency swaps.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'swap_info', 'description': 'information about foreign exchange swaps and currency swaps.'}]}, {'name': 'HedgingStrategy.recommend_strategy', 'description': 'Recommend a hedging strategy based on current exchange rate and historical volatility.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'current_rate', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the current exchange rate of the currency pair'}, {'name': 'volatility', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the historical volatility of the currency pair'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'strategy', 'description': 'the recommended hedging strategy.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我需要对冲澳元兑日元的汇率风险。首先，获取当前澳元兑日元的汇率。接着，分析过去一年内澳元兑日元汇率的波动情况。然后，提供一些外汇掉期和货币互换的信息。最后，基于当前汇率和波动情况，推荐一个适合的对冲策略。
获取当前澳元兑日元的汇率
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'currency_pair'的值是什么?

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'rate': 90.5}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 分析过去一年内澳元兑日元汇率的波动情况
